resources.string: A visual representation of the current action with this frame
Would you like to import the narrative %1$s?
This narrative contains audio that is incompatible with video files (currently M4A, MP3 and WAV are supported). This audio will not be included in the video. Continue exporting?
Creating video file – this may take some time…
Tap to save or share your video
%1$s – tap the notification to save or share your video
Error: couldn\'t open the narrative – please try again
Error: failed to export the narrative – please try again
Error: unable to find a temporary directory – please ensure your device or SD card has free space available
Warning: No external storage found – on some devices this can cause export issues, and you may encounter problems playing the narrative
Error: couldn\'t create the files to export – please try again
Error: a file with that name already exists – please choose a different name
The narrative has been saved to your device in the %1$s folder
Select a template to load, or long-press for additional options
The template will be permanently deleted
Error: failed to export the template – please try again

No templates found


To make an existing narrative into a template, choose "Make template" from the frame editor's options menu
Error loading text editor – please try again
All the text on this frame will be permanently deleted
Please add text before creating a new frame
Please add text before spanning to other frames
This text will now show on all frames after this one, up to the next frame with text
This text will now show on this frame only
Error loading image editor – please try again
Error: there was a problem communicating with the camera – please try again
Unable to take pictures (no camera detected) – opening gallery instead
Tap the picture to re-take or import from your gallery
Tap the picture to replace from your gallery
Tap the screen to focus the camera
The image taken with the camera
Error: failed to save the picture – please try again
Error: failed to import the picture – please try again
Sorry, unable to import pictures on this device – no gallery found
The image will be permanently deleted
Please add an image before creating a new frame
Please add an image before spanning to other frames
This image will now show on all frames after this one, up to the next frame with an image
This image will now show on this frame only
Error loading sound editor – please try again
Error playing the sound – please try again
Error recording the sound – please try again
Unable to start recording (no microphone detected) – opening music library instead
Tap the player to replace from your music library
Tap the player to add to the audio or import from your music library
Error: failed to import the audio – please try again
Sorry, unable to import audio on this device – no music library found
The sound will be permanently deleted
Please record audio before creating a new frame
Sorry, this audio is in a format that cannot be edited. To replace it, please delete the current recording first
Please record audio before spanning to other frames
This audio will now play over all frames after this one, up to the next frame with audio
This audio will now play on this frame only
Error loading frame editor – please try again
All the content in this frame will be permanently deleted
Please add media before starting playback
Please add media before creating a new frame
This narrative will now show in the list of templates when creating a new narrative
Please add media to this frame before creating a template
Swipe: there are no more frames in this narrative
The narrative this frame belongs to will be permanently deleted
This image is from another frame – would you like to add a new image here, or edit the original?
This audio is from another frame – would you like to add new audio here, or edit the original?
This text is from another frame – would you like to add new text here, or edit the original?
%1$s needs camera access in order to be able to take photos. Please grant this permission if you would like to use images in your narrative
Error: camera access has not been granted. Please allow %1$s to access the camera and try again
%1$s needs microphone access in order to be able to record audio. Please grant this permission if you would like to use audio in your narrative
Error: microphone access has not been granted. Please allow %1$s to access the microphone and try again
Import complete – each item has been added to a new frame after this one
Unable to complete multi-item import – please check frames after this one for errors

plurals.name: delete_narrative_second_hint
plurals.item: The entire narrative (%1$d frame) will be permanently deleted
The entire narrative (%1$d frames) will be permanently deleted

resources.string: Error: unable to find your narratives. Please check that any removable storage (e.g., SD card) is still available
Error: unable to find your narratives
Error: couldn\'t find the folder to import narratives from – please set the import directory in settings
No narratives found to import – all files from a SMIL export should be placed in the import directory selected in settings (currently %1$s)

%1$s needs storage access in order to be able to import narratives, save media to your library and export videos to some services (e.g., YouTube). Please grant this permission if you would like to use these features
Error: storage access has not been granted. Please allow %1$s to access your device\'s storage and try again
%1$s has been denied access to your device\'s storage – exporting to folders and some external services may fail

Welcome to
%1$s!

Touch to edit,
long press to play
Editing: add pictures, sounds or text
Playback: view or export your narrative
Touch + to get started, and enjoy!\n\nWe\'d love to hear how you get on – you can send feedback via \"%1$s\" in %2$s
Touch %1$s to record, then %2$s to skip forward (or %3$s to redo). Preview to check and save your changes
All timing adjustments that have ever been made to this narrative will be removed, restoring it to its default state
The narrative\'s default timings have been restored
Preview the changes to your narrative, then choose whether to save or cancel your edits
Your timing edits have been saved
Leaving without saving will discard your changes
Your timing edits have been discarded

Getting started:
timing editor tips

Long press here to watch an introduction, then edit its timing to practice
When editing, you record each frame\'s duration in live time\n\nAudio will play as normal, but images and text will be extended until you press %1$s to change frames
If you make a mistake, press %1$s to go back. You can reset timings or cancel your changes anytime\n\nTry it now – select \"Edit timing\" from the %2$s menu, then press %3$s to start
Why not use the timing editor to set your own durations for photo captions?\n\nOr, use it with spanning media to match subtitles with background music
Please do send feedback via \"%1$s\" in %2$s – we\'d love to know if you find this feature useful
Pictures will be captured in low quality (small file size)
Pictures will be captured in high quality (rear camera only)
Pictures will not be added to your gallery
Pictures will be added to your gallery
Try changing if you experience audio recording problems. Higher quality causes slower export
Audio recordings will not be added to your music library
Audio recordings will be added to your music library
Default duration for each frame. Double tap here to reset
Default duration for each word of text. Double tap here to reset
Higher quality leads to larger exported file sizes. Lower quality is faster to export
Try changing if you experience video export problems. MP4 is more compatible with external video players
Resampled audio is slower to export, but more compatible with external video players
Exported videos will match the combined aspect ratio of the images they contain
Exported videos will be square, regardless of their image aspect ratio
Choose where to save exported narratives. The default location is your Downloads folder
Error: unable to read the selected directory; reverting to the previous location
Narratives sent via Bluetooth will not be imported automatically; you can import via the \"Scan and Import\" menu option
The import directory will be monitored for incoming narratives
Set the directory to monitor for narratives. Choose your Bluetooth directory to automatically scan for incoming files
You will be prompted before importing each narrative
Imported files will be left in place
Files will be removed from the import directory when processed
Template deletion will not be allowed
Set the desired screen rotation behaviour
Narratives will be scrolled to the end on startup – useful for regularly adding to ongoing stories
The button will not be shown – use your back button to navigate
Media items will only appear on one frame
Media items will be able to span multiple frames
Text will be embedded in the video
Text will be exported in a separate SRT file (except when it is the only content in a frame)
Beta: WARNING – these are experimental features – data loss may occur!
The timing editor feature is disabled
Use the option on the playback screen to set more precise timings for each frame
A short helper narrative has been installed to help with editing timings
Email us your feedback, or report a problem

Please enter your feedback here. If you are reporting a problem, please describe what happens in as much detail as possible.




Application version (please leave this in place): %1$s
Error: unable to send feedback – please email %1$s instead
Tap to add a narrative containing help and tips
The help and tips narrative has been installed
Add your language, or suggest translation improvements
Browse, fork or report issues on GitHub
Translators and open source software licenses
